description: Number of n-step polygons on f.c.c. lattice.
references: A. J. Guttman, Polygons, Polyominoes and Polycubes, Lecture Notes in Physics Volume 775, 2009, Chapter 16.

M. F. Sykes et al., Lattice constant systems and graph theory, J. Math. Phys., 7 (1966), 1557-1572.
